title: Pasta tuna salad with broccoli
ingredients: ['400g tricoloured pasta', '2 red peppers (or 1 orange and 1 red pepper), cut into strips', '350 to 400g broccoli, cut into florets', '2 (175g) tins tuna in water, drained', '3 tablespoons capers', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tabelspoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons soured cream or mayonnaise (optional)', 'salt and pepper']
